fr.uga.pddl4j.util

Class MemoryAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.uga.pddl4j.util.MemoryAgent

  • public class MemoryAgent
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements memory agent enable to compute approximation of the size of java objects. In order to start this agent you must add the following option to the command-line: 
     -javaagent:pddl4j.jar
    Then, to know the size of an object just the class MemoryAgent. For instance: 
     // Configuration
 MemoryAgent.skipFinalField(false);
 MemoryAgent.skipFlyweightObject(false);
 MemoryAgent.skipStaticField(false);

 // Calculate object size
 MemoryAgent.deepSizeOf(objectToSize);
    See Also:
    Instrumentation

      • premain

        public static void premain(java.lang.String options,
                           java.lang.instrument.Instrumentation instrumentation)
        Call back method used by the Java VM to inject the java.lang.instrument.Instrument instance.
        Parameters:
        options - the options of the agent.
        instrumentation - the instrumentation object injected.

      • skipFinalField

        public static void skipFinalField(boolean flag)
        Allows to skip the final field while computing the deep size of an object. Default value is Default value is MemoryAgent.DEFAULT_SKIP_FINAL_FIELD.
        Parameters:
        flag - true the final field must be skip; false otherwise.

      • skipStaticField

        public static void skipStaticField(boolean flag)
        Allows to skip the static field while computing the deep size of an object. Default value is Default value is MemoryAgent.DEFAULT_SKIP_FINAL_FIELD.
        Parameters:
        flag - true the static field must be skip; false otherwise.

      • skipFlyweightObject

        public static void skipFlyweightObject(boolean flag)
        Allows to skip the flyweight object. If true flyweight objects has a size of 0. Default value is MemoryAgent.DEFAULT_SKIP_FLYWEIGHT_FIELD.
        Parameters:
        flag - true the flyweight object must be skip; false otherwise.

      • sizeOf

        public static long sizeOf(java.lang.Object object)
        Returns an implementation-specific approximation of the amount of storage consumed by the specified object in bytes. The result may include some or all of the object's overhead, and thus is useful for comparison within an implementation but not between implementations. The estimate may change during a single invocation of the JVM. The method counts only the primitive contained in the specified object.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to size
        Returns:
        an implementation-specific approximation of the amount of storage consumed by the specified object in bytes.
        See Also:
        Instrumentation.getObjectSize(Object)

      • deepSizeOf

        public static long deepSizeOf(java.lang.Object object)
        Compute an implementation-specific approximation of the amount of storage consumed by object and by all the objects reachable from it
        Parameters:
        object - the object to size.
        Returns:
        an implementation-specific approximation of the amount of storage consumed by objectToSize and by all the objects reachable from it
